siddhiya:-rathri bhagaye muhudu giya oruwak perali ehisiti hamuda sebalu 4 denagen 3 deneku diwi galawagath athara ek ayeku miyayana ladi..miyagiya aya awurudu wisipahaka pamana monaragala padinchi hamudawe sebaleki.oruwa peralimen pasu ithiri thidena pina with athi athara aneka manga durak yanathek anik sebalek wisin adagena with atha..eheth ekwara ohu yatagiya waga anik sebala pawasa atha..dina dekakata pasu kalapuwata miniya gasagena with atha namuth ewita miniya bohoseyin narak wi thibunu bawata dutu aya pawasathi.
eda samajaye siti wahalun saha pa්rawenidasayan ema ka්riyawaliye pe්rakshakayo wuha.
